Aug. 5, 1979 D Chatsworth House Contest
Chatsworth House Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
chatsworth-house-contest
None
Chatsworth House Grounds, Derbyshire, England, UK Best soloist - John Baggott - Coventry School of Music. Black Country Brass - Â£50 prize for new music. Shirland Miners - best Derbyshire band. Each band required to include march 'The Challenge' by W.Calvert in its 25 minute programme. This contest had a pre draw for order of play. 9 bands competed.
Aug. 13, 2011, 11:38 a.m. Nov. 3, 2017, 5:08 p.m.
